transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Yes, good evening, main Radhe baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART ke quarter se sir. Aapki jo company hai hamare sath Global Organic usse related aapne hamare sath concern raise kiya hai, kaafi senior discussions bhi aapke sath kar rahe hain. So main maine saari recordings bhi suni hui hai aaj ki aur kal parso jitni bhi recordings hai aapki saari cheeze detail wale suni hui hai. Sir right now we have a solution na ki aap jitna buylead aap consumption kar rahe ho kyuki sir dekhiye koi bhi itna active client hai aur wo ye keh raha hai ki mere ko IndiaMART se consumption milta hai lekin maturity nahi mil rahi hai to IndiaMART kabhi bhi maturity ke liye aapko commit nahi karta hai ki hum aapko business nikal ke denge kyuki client at the end aap log deal kar rahe hote ho.
Customer: Mujhe package sale karaya gaya tha ek baat sun lijiye mujhe jab package sale karaya gaya tha 2024 mein 12 August 2024 2024 mein jab package sale karaya gaya tha tab ke jo mere account manager the aur unke senior manager Arjit Agarwal aur Vimal Singh karke the unhone itna fake itna fake matlab commitment kiya tha ki hum do mahine mein do lakh ka business kara ke denge ye kara ke denge wo kara ke denge itne fake commitments kiye the to mera kya hai ki mere kya hai ki mere ghar mein koi kisi ka death hua tha to kya hai ki main us tension mein tha aur wo mujhe bar bar call kar rahe the to itna kara ke denge mera mera package october mein khatam hone wala tha to uske pehle hi matlab wo sirf unko package sale karwana tha usko unko mere sath matlab kuch pada nahi tha ki mera profit ho jaye ya loss ho jaye baad mein kya hai ki ek mahine baad wo wahi matlab change ho gaye account manager unhone kuch help bhi nahi kiya bahut se miscommitment wagera hai na ki the to ye chal raha tha aap bol rahe hain na ki IndiaMART kisi commitment nahi karta ye nahi karta to unhone kiye the to uske bihaf pe hi maine package renewal karwaya tha aur renewal karwane ke baad bhi matlab itna issue aa raha hai pichle saal se wagera ki business itna mera consumption bhi aap dekh lo ki consumption
Executive: Main aapke saare recorded concern sun chuki hu aap jo cheez mujhe bol rahe ho already aap ye mere khyal se kaafi baar repeat kar rahe hain right now we have only solution is please go to the same services we don't upgrade any services sir try to understand please go to the same services we don't have any option for the refund if you want to cancel your subscription so we are cancelled but we can't providing the refund we don't have any option because IndiaMART is any platform we are not providing like this
Customer: Nahi mujhe to commitment kiya gaya tha aisa hai aur mujhe kya hai ki main pareshan hu IndiaMART use karke bhi pareshan hu main aisa hai aur mujhe commitment kiya gaya tha aapne aapke jo employee ne commitment wagera kiya tha to wahi matlab main baitha hu
Executive: I'm so sorry for that verbally baat pe hum log discuss nahi kar sakte sir koi bhi platform
Customer: Mujhe solution karo main dekh lunga kya karna kya hai ki aapka solution hai na aapka solution hi mujhe nahi chahiye aapka solution na har bar kya hai ki fake fake customers wagera hai na entertain nahi kar sakta main aisa hai fake customers wagera back end team hai back end team hai aapka jo kya back end team kya kar
Executive: Ha wahi to baat hai main wahi bol raha hu ki aap matlab mujhe resolution nahi provide kar sakte mera refund chahiye mujhe
Executive: Just a second we can't providing the refund there is a nothing any refund policy try to understand and
Customer: Mujhe try to understand nahi mam kya hai ki aapke employees ne ek fake commitment kyu kiya tha tab aapke employee se puch lo na
Executive: Employee there is nothing in the process
Customer: Kyu nahi nahi process mein nahi hai to employee ne kyu kiya IndiaMART ke bihaf pe unhone commitment kiya tha ye main unka naam bhi bata raha hu na aapko aisa hai to unse kyu nahi puchte ho aap aapne ye commitment kyu kiya pe kiya
Executive: Ek option aur available reh sakta hai aap ye cheez bol do aap mere ko ek mahine mein 70 buylead consumption karke dikhaye zero to four hours ke andar
Customer: Maine already teen bar ye data share kiya hai Shubham Thakur ji aur unke karke ye account the unke sath maine already kiya kiya hua hai main dobara ye nahi kam kar sakta aisa hai har roz main wahi main already frustrated hu IndiaMART use karke IndiaMART kya hai ki IndiaMART ka service use karke hi main frustrated hu to ye sab cheeze har roz main nahi kar sakta ki bar bar phone karo aur complaint karo karke aisa hai koi bhi agar complaint kar raha hai ki har roz complaint karta hai to uske piche koi to reason
Executive: Sir agar aap sun nahi pa rahe hain na to koi matlab nahi hai baat chit karne ka aap aap sun nahi pa rahe ho aap bhi sun nahi reh pa rahe ho aap mujhe aur kuch bol rahe ho
Customer: Aap ye bol rahe hain ab aur hi kuch bol rahe ho
Executive: Sorry sir I'm so sorry I can't discuss with you all.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the package.

- Customer alleges fake commitments by IndiaMART employees.

- Customer is frustrated with IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive stated no refund policy.

- Executive suggested continuing with existing services.

- Executive mentioned an option to show buylead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, commitment, buyleads, subscription, resolution
